articles.title: Reward or redemption? World Test Championship final looks entirely different for Australia and India - The Guardian
articles.description: While the two nations face off at The Oval, cricket fans will also be wondering about the future of the fixture
articles.content: Soon it will arrive: not just the second Test of the English summer, but the second edition of the World Test Championship final. As Australia and India prepare to play off in London, the matchs plac… [+9949 chars]

articles.title: Oil protest threat forces ICC to have two pitches for ICC World Test Championship Final - ANI News
articles.description: The International Cricket Council (ICC) have prepared two pitches for World Test Championship Final between India and Australia following a threat from oil protesters who threatened to vandalize the pitch and ground during the match.
articles.content: London [UK], June 7 (ANI): The International Cricket Council (ICC) have prepared two pitches for World Test Championship Final between India and Australia following a threat from oil protesters who t… [+2656 chars]
